column1: Master of Science in Maritime Science
column5: Dive deeper into the fascinating world of maritime science with this master of science developed by two universities. Take your master to the next level or enhance your work in the sector by exploring every angle of the profession, thanks to this unique, multi-disciplinary approach.
column7: The tuition fee for the Maritime Science programme is € 6.550. The costs of study trips and company visits are included. Fees do not cover course materials or living expenses.
